Package org.graffiti.managers

Interface ToolManager

All Superinterfaces:
PluginManagerListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultToolManager
public interface ToolManager
extends PluginManagerListener
An interface for managing a list of tools.
Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
